Package shapes

Class PhysicsShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.PhysicsShape
  • public class PhysicsShape
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the physics of all moving objects in the program
    Version:
    Alpha
    Author:
    Krishan Patel and Nihal Ernest

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PhysicsShape​(Shape newShape, java.awt.Color fillColor, java.awt.Color strokeColor)
      Constructs a new physics shape based on another shape, fill color, and outline color

      • PhysicsShape

        public PhysicsShape​(Shape newShape,
                    java.awt.Color fillColor,
                    java.awt.Color strokeColor)
        Constructs a new physics shape based on another shape, fill color, and outline color
        Parameters:
        newShape - the shape on which the physics is based
        fillColor - the color which the shape should be filled with
        strokeColor - the outline color of the shape
